content: I well recall my bewilderment on first arriving at Zulip. We constantly have people posting questions in Announcements (perhaps because it's alphabetically early?) and being told to stop it. Why not have a stream clearly labeled as such? And perhaps make it float to the top by putting a ? first: "? Where do I post this?" or "? Newcomer questions"?
@Tim Abbott is there a good character to use to make a strea mbe listed first?
If it is sorted alphabetically, what about '!'?
Users can also pin streams to the top of the sidebar, individually.
But I think the better option is to block access to posting in #Announcements for new users.
